dcterms:creator: G. Datseris
A. Wagemakers
dcterms:description: Basins of attraction computed from the Dufﬁng oscillator, showcasing the regions in phase space where initial conditions lead to a specific attractor.
dcterms:title: Dufﬁng oscillator

dcterms:creator: G. Datseris
A. Wagemakers
dcterms:description: Basins of attraction computed from the forced damped pendulum, illustrating the regions in phase space leading to different attractors.
dcterms:title: Forced damped pendulum

dcterms:creator: G. Datseris
A. Wagemakers
dcterms:description: Basins of attraction computed from the Newton fractal, demonstrating the complex structure of attractors in the phase space.
dcterms:title: Newton fractal

dcterms:creator: M. Hénon
C. Heiles
dcterms:description: Exit basins from the Hénon-Heiles Hamiltonian system, which serve a similar purpose as basins of attraction in open Hamiltonian systems.
dcterms:title: Hénon-Heiles system

dcterms:creator: G. Datseris
A. Wagemakers
dcterms:description: Basins of attraction computed from the magnetic pendulum, illustrating the regions in phase space leading to different attractors influenced by magnetic forces.
dcterms:title: Magnetic pendulum
